title: To plan inclusive events
description: When planning events, it is important to consider the needs and preferences of all participants. This includes making sure that the event is accessible to everyone, and that everyone feels welcome and included. Here are some tips for planning inclusive events:
tip_1: Inform participants about if the event has accessibility features, such as ramps, elevators, or accessible bathrooms
tip_2: Be aware of bright lights, loud noises, or strong smells that may be overwhelming for some participants
tip_3: Inform participants about the food and drinks that will be served, and provide options for people with dietary restrictions or allergies
tip_4: Everyone has different energy levels and social preferences, so make sure to provide quiet spaces or activities for people who need a break
